name: Chicky Duo
description:
Embark on a farmtastic point-and-click adventure with two adorable chicks!

Did the chicken or the egg come first?
In this adorable point-and-click puzzle adventure game, the chicken comes first. As in, first priority!

Featuring delicious eye candy, unique puzzles and lively animation, the rescue mission starts from the egg and soars all the way into the clouds. Will the two chicks be able to save their mother before she is taken away from them forever?

Combine the strengths of both chicks to make the rescue mission a success!

• Minimal text, easy to pick-up
• Lively animation and polished art
• A handful of interesting mini puzzles
• Complete chapters through their teamwork
• Adorable characters, especially our chicks-on-a-mission: Butter and Cream
• Universal app: play on your iPhone, iPad or iPod
• iCloud support for you to share your progress across devices

Chicky Duo’s lively animation along with its minimal use of text makes it a suitable game for parents and children to enjoy together.

For more information or if you have enquiries/feedback, drop by one of the below:
